data.title: Employer Education Benefits
data.meta_description: Explore employer education benefits from DeVry University's partners. Employer tuition reimbursement is just one of the benefits that can help you.
data.text:
Deferred Tuition Payment Plan is offered to students who are eligible to receive tuition reimbursement through their employer. A benefit of this payment plan is that the tuition is deferred and not due until after the student completes the class.

Family Tuition Education Benefits are available through select DeVry University corporate partners, which extend partnership benefits to employees’ immediate family members. This gives spouses and children the chance to save on tuition while earning a degree from our accredited university.*

Find Out More

Tailored learning opportunities are aimed at educating employees in market-responsive areas, so you can be prepared to succeed in a rewarding field that serves your organization’s needs.

Personal attention from a team of advisors who take time to understand your goals. Our advisors can help you maximize your partnership benefits and put your education to work for you.

Career Services and Talent Match for our employer partners. This benefit connects you with career advising, online self-service tools and access to job listings.

Flexibility to take classes online and at multiple locations lets you earn your degree on a timeline that works with your busy schedule, whether you’re learning on campus or online.1

Grants and Scholarships may be available to those who apply and qualify.2 One to check out is our Opportunity Grant,3 which is a grant you may be able to take advantage of to offset college expenses early on, and an opportunity for us to welcome you as you start your DeVry experience.
